ARABIC: قُلْ كُلٌّ يَعْمَلُ عَلَىٰ شَاكِلَتِهِۦ فَرَبُّكُمْ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ هُوَ أَهْدَىٰ سَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Each man acts according to his nature, but your Lord knows best who is best guided on the Path.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Each one acts according to his disposition, but your Lord knows well who follow the right path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say, (O Prophet): "Each one acts according to his own manner. Your Lord knows well who is best-guided to the Right Path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Everyone does as he wants. Your Lord knows best who has the right guidance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “Each one works according to his own pattern; and your Lord well knows him who is more upon guidance.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Each one does according to Shakilatihi, and your Lord knows best of him whose path is right."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Every one acts according to his manner; but your Lord best knows who is best guided in the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Every man works according to his own manner; but your Lord knows very well what man is best guided as to the way.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Each one doth according to his rule of conduct, and thy Lord is Best Aware of him whose way is right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say to them, "Everyone acts in his own way, and your Lord knows best who is rightly guided."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: everyone worketh after his disposition, and your Lord is the Best Knower of him who is best guided on the Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Everyone acts according to his character. Your Lord knows best who is better guided with regard to the way.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Everyone acts according to his own disposition: But your Lord knows best who it is that is best guided on the Way."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW to mankind): "Each one does according to Shakilatihi (i.e. his way or his religion or his intentions, etc.), and your Lord knows best of him whose path (religion, etc.) is right."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Each human works in his own manner. But your Lord knows very well who is best guided on the way'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Each does according to his disposition. Your Lord knows best who is better guided in the way.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:84] Say: ‘Everyone, [including] us and you, acts according to his [own] character, his [own] manner [of conduct], and your Lord knows best who is better guided as to the way’, [as to] the path [he follows], and He will reward him [accordingly].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad: (Each one) of you (doth according to his rule of conduct) according to his intention and the state in which he is in; it is also said that this means: according to his standpoint and natural disposition, (and thy Lord is best aware of him whose way is right) whose religion is correct.
